name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: GradeAssist: AI Essay Grading Tools for Teachers

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save time with the AI grading sidekick for teachers, with Smart Annotations, Criteria Breakdown, AI detection and Plagiarism Check.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
GradeAssist adds AI essay grading tools into Google Docs and Canvas, helping teachers save time grading, deliver better feedback and reduce bias.

‚û§ Effortless Grading
GradeAssist analyzes essays based on your custom rubric criteria.
Supercharge your grading and feedback writing process in one click!

‚û§ Personalized Feedback
AI-generated annotations guide students toward improvement.
Enhance learning outcomes with constructive feedback.

‚û§ Plagiarism Detection
GradeAssist flags potential plagiarism, promoting academic integrity.
Keep your classroom fair and transparent.

‚û§ Grade Estimates
Get preliminary grade estimates (within ¬±5% accuracy).
Use them as a starting point for your final evaluation.

‚û§ Streamlined Workflow:
Open GradeAssist in the sidebar while working in Google Docs.
Seamlessly grade essays without switching tabs.

Install GradeAssist today and supercharge your grading experience! üöÄüìù

‚û§ What‚Äôs included?
GradeAssist is available for free to all users to grade up to 10 essays a month. You can upgrade to the paid plan if you need to grade more essays, and get all the tools you need as a teacher for just the price of lunch!

~ Free
The free version of GradeAssist delivers a criteria breakdown and annotations designed to help you speed up grading, for up to 10 essays/month.
‚Ä¢ Grade Estimates
‚Ä¢ Criteria Breakdown
‚Ä¢ Smart Annotations

~ Premium
GradeAssist Premium includes everything available for free, plus an expanded range of tools designed to help you deliver the best high-quality targeted feedback that drives student success and academic integrity.
‚Ä¢ Plagiarism Check
‚Ä¢ AI Writing Detection
‚Ä¢ Grade Estimates
‚Ä¢ Criteria Breakdown
‚Ä¢ Smart Annotations

‚û§ Works where you work
GradeAssist is constantly evolving to support more teachers across various platforms, which is why is it now supported on Google Docs, Canvas, and more to come! 

‚û§ Trusted by teachers at Top schools
